answers.author: Robert Nanni
answers.text:
You can look at all the state affiliations, such as municpal leagues and county affiliations also. I know Slavin Management and Colin Baezinger are two recruiters.

answers.author: Randy Bukas
answers.text:
You can also check out the list of vendors at the ICMA Conference. There are usually a number of recruiters at the conference.


You can also check out the list of vendors at the ICMA Conference. There are usually a number of recruiters at the conference.

answers.author: Michelle Flaherty
answers.text:
Check out govtjobs.com  They not only post current vacancies but also a list of search firms.

author: Mario Acosta
text:
Greetings,
I am looking for job opportunities for deputy, assistant and city managers.  I would like the names of recruiters, and/or websites that I should keep an eye on, such as ICMA.  My goal is attain employment as a deputy or assistant city manager.  Thank you for any information.  
Mario Acosta
title: Job Postings for City Manager Positions
